Solution of \(ax^2+bx+c=0\) is \[x=\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}\] \[\ce{H2SO4} \pu{1.0e-20}\] \[x=\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}\] \[\ce{C6H5-CHO}\] \[\ce{$A$ ->[\ce{+H2O}] $B$}\] \[\ce{SO4^2- + Ba^2+ -> BaSO4 v}\] \[\ce{A\bond{-}B\bond{=}C\bond{#}D}\] \[\pu{1.0e-20}\]
